overview: Audrey Hollander is your typical stuck-up head cheerleader. You know, the kind that dates the star quarterback and makes life hell for all the nerdy kids in class. Worse still, all her bitchy antics take all the fun out of being a lipstick lesbian cheerleader, and that's unacceptable. After putting up with her prissy bullshit for far too long, the rest of the squad decides to teach this redhead cunt a much deserved lesson - a lesson in how much sexual activity you can endure before reaching your psychological breaking point.
title: The Violation of Audrey Hollander
